DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether insulin glulisine decrease breakfast post prandial glycemic excursion comparison insulin aspart .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Insulin Glulisine Compared With Insulin Aspart Breakfast Post Prandial Glucose Levels Prepubertal Children
DOC.detailed_description: This treatment , open label , crossover study compare two four hour breakfast post prandial blood glucose level receive dose insulin glulisine insulin aspart administer subcutaneously consume breakfast meal prescribe menu contain 45 , 60 75 gram carbohydrate . Each subject receive insulin glulisine ten day insulin aspart ten day .
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: current patient Helen DeVos Children 's Hospital Diabetes Clinic ; age 411 year ; prepubertal ( Tanner Stage I ) ; diagnose type 1 diabetes mellitus positive islet cell antibody present time diagnosis positive serum urine ketone require insulin since diagnosis ; least six month date diagnosis type 1 diabetes mellitus ; TSH within reference range negative transglutaminase IgA antibody within nine month study start ; HbA1C 6.9 10 % within 30 day study start ; parent guardian able willing provide write informed consent prior enrollment ; time study start , current insulin regimen include multiple daily injection insulin glargine basal insulin insulin aspart insulin lispro premeal rapid act insulin pubertal ( Tanner stage 2 great ) ; concurrent Addison 's disease , celiac disease untreated hypothyroidism ; receive oral , injectable inhaled steroid immunosuppressant medication ; receive stimulant treatment attention deficit disorder attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ; intercurrent illness fever > 101 degree F , infection , gastroenteritis ; use medication treat diabetes list inclusion criterion ; potential lack compliance issue , opinion investigator , would compromise subject 's safety successful participation study
